name: Dove Advanced Care Hand Wash Deep Moisture Pack of 3 for Soft, Smooth Skin More Moisturizers Than The Leading Ordinary Hand Soap, 34 oz
short_description: MOISTURE BOOST 5X COMPLEX: Infused with our unique blend of moisturizers and skin-natural nutrients, our Advanced Care Deep Moisture hand wash refill cares for hands so even knuckles, cuticles, and palms are moisturized
REMOVES GERMS IN SECONDS: This gentle skin cleanser washes away dirt and germs, while moisturizing hands for hours
REFILL: Contains 2.8 12oz liquid hand wash bottles
HOW TO USE: Add a generous pump of this hand wash to wet hands. Rub your hands together to work the product into a lather, before rinsing with water. Always wash for at least 20 seconds
DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED BRAND: Our Advanced Care Deep Moisture formula with gentle cleansers is as mild as water and nourishes skin 10 layers deep for soft, smooth hands
product_description: Nourish your skin and uplift your senses with Dove Advanced Care Deep Moisture Hand Wash Refill. Infused with skin-natural nutrients in our unique Moisture Boost 5x Complex, this hand wash nourishes skin 10 layers deep so even knuckles, cuticles, and palms are moisturized. Our Advanced Care formula effectively washes away dirt and germs, while moisturizing hands for hours. Plus, this hydrating hand wash is sulfate-free and paraben-free and uses 100% recycled plastic bottles. Dove care goes further than just cleansing your hands. Dove is a dermatologist recommended brand that is as mild as water and made with gentle cleansers. Also, our Advanced Care hand wash is vegan and Dove is PETA Approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world. How to use: add a generous pump of this hand wash to wet hands. Rub your hands together to work the product into a lather, before rinsing with water. Always wash for at least 20 seconds. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look-reaching over ¼ of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We are also committed to a landmark new initiative as part of our 2025 commitment to reduce plastic waste; reducing over 20,500 metric tons of virgin plastic annually by making the iconic beauty bar packaging plastic-free globally; launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles; and trialing a new refillable deodorant format. As one of the largest beauty brands in the world, we are revealing an agenda-setting commitment to tackle the global beauty industry's plastic waste issue. More moisturizers vs the leading hand soap variant based on 2021 unit sales of non-antibacterial liquid hand soaps.

product_description: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals All-Purpose Liquid Hand Soap is enriched with vitamins, natural exfoliants, antioxidants and aloe vera to leave skin feeling clean and smooth. Contains Vitamin E, aloe vera, flaxseed, and essential oils of lavender. Our toxin-free hand soap is cruelty-free, 100% vegan and contains no parabens, phosphate, sulfate or gluten. The creamy formula easily washes away dirt and germs and safely lathers on skin so you can stay protected and clean. A small drop goes a long way as the liquid hand soap quickly creates a rich, satisfying lather that leaves skin deeply hydrated and refreshingly clean. Natural ingredients moisturize and hydrate the skin to prevent dry hands after multiple washes a day. Refill size is perfect for fitness centers, hotels, spas, salons, and home use. Ginger Lily Farms is PETA certified. Directions: Apply Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals All-Purpose Hand Soap to wet hands. Rub hands together thoroughly for 20 seconds. Rinse and dry hands.
